attributes.action: Do not extend article 50 we must leave the European Union on this date
attributes.additional_details: We must leave on the 29th of march no excuses uphold democracy in this country
attributes.background: The British public are fed up with politicians in Westminster who are determined to delay or stop Brexit, this country is meant to be a democracy, we do not want an extension to article 50 we are fed up of politicians going against the will of 17.4 million people, enough excuses we must leave
